name: Yamatoho
description: In the village of Yamatoho, there live two brothers who are skilled swordsmen. The big brother knows geology and DNA transmutation, he discovered that he can combine plant, animal or human. His superhuman intelligence turned him into a villain and amassed an army of monsters that he combined, but only he knows how to decipher DNA. After his little brother discovers him, he does not want to kill him, but he tries to push him away to complete a plan to control the world, but his brother tries to reach him, kill him, and stop the invasion. Yuki is benevolent and helps people. He tries to save his village from the monsters that have been manipulated by his brother. can he ?
